alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 3:41PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT HUMBOLDT AND DEL NORTE COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM PST... At 340 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers near McKinleyville, or near Arcata, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eureka, Arcata, Crescent City, Orick, Jedediah Smith State Park, Grizzly Creek Redwoods State Park, Garberville, Honeydew, Klamath, Jack McNamera Field, Shelter Cove, Willow Creek, Fortuna, Rio Dell, Bertsch-Oceanview, Weitchpec, Carlotta, Bridgeville, Petrolia, and Myers Flat. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
